title: Update Member
description: This operation is used to update customer name, email, role, status of a customer profile and contact dynamic properties.

firstName.description: the first name of the profile

lastName.description: the last name of the profile

roles.description: List of role's function that need to associate with the user

receiveEmail.description: the string representation of whether the user wants to recieve email or not, it should be 'yes' or 'no'

active.description: This is active status of the profile should be true or false.

email.description: the email address of the profile
